Key Match Events: Rookie Hayden Birdsong lasted just 3 2/3 innings against the Brewers.
Birdsong gave up five runs, including a home run to Garrett Mitchell.
Aaron Civale pitched seven scoreless innings for the Brewers.
The Brewers scored one of their runs on a double steal in the third inning.
Giants third baseman Matt Chapman mishandled a throw, allowing William Contreras to score.
Post-Match Reflections: Birdsong expressed frustration with his performance, noting he hasn't been able to pitch deep into games.
Manager Bob Melvin commented on Birdsong's high pitch count leading to his early exit.
Melvin expressed frustration with the team's overall performance in the game.
Matt Chapman insisted that the team remains confident about making a playoff run despite the loss.
